name: Math Mechanic
description:
Math Mechanic is a game intended for Players between 9-15 age group , to practice Mathematics while playing a fun game.Targeted to be a mobile game , Math Mechanic looks a gem on an android Phone or tablet.

Available in Android , osx , Win32 , Linux32 , Linux 64 , Math Mechanic works on Creating Math bases questions depending on your selection of Arthematics. Game helps kids to solve basic math problems while playing an interesting game , keeps them attracted in doing math.
